notes.text:
This update for open-lldp fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-10932: Fixed an improper sanitization of shell-escape codes. (bsc#1104624)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: lldptool version 1.0.1 and older can print a raw, unsanitized attacker controlled buffer when mngAddr information is displayed. This may allow an attacker to inject shell control characters into the buffer and impact the behavior of the terminal.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
